description: King of submissions from back with forearm across throat squeezing carotids
key_points: Forearm across throat|Hand grabs bicep|Other hand behind head|Squeeze expanding chest
common_mistakes: Arm not under chin|Loose grip|Not behind head|Too high
counters: Two hands on arm|Chin defense|Clearing arm

description: Quick RNC variation targeting front of throat with rapid pressure
key_points: Forearm across front of throat|Quick finish|Less setup|Explosive squeeze

description: High percentage gi choke from back using collar and pants grip stretching like drawing bow
key_points: Deep cross collar grip|Same side pants grip|Stretch opponent|Collar pressure choke
common_mistakes: Grip not deep|No pants grip|Not stretching|Loose

description: Fundamental gi choke using deep cross grips on opponent's collar from various positions
key_points: Deep grip thumb inside|Second grip crosses over|Pull elbows tight|Squeeze forearms

description: Signature BJJ choke trapping head and arm between legs in triangle configuration
key_points: Leg over neck lock triangle|Cut angle toward arm|Squeeze with hamstrings|Pull head down
common_mistakes: Not cutting angle|Loose|Flat position|Arm not in

description: Triangle choke executed from mount position when one arm in one arm out
key_points: Create one arm in one out|Swing leg over|Lock triangle|Finish mounted or transition

description: Choke encircling opponent's head and arm using their own shoulder to compress carotid
key_points: Walk arm across face|Encircle head and arm|Lock hands|Dismount to finish
common_mistakes: Arm not across|Too loose|Wrong angle|Not tight

description: Arm-in guillotine variation threading under armpit around neck invented by Joe D'arce
key_points: Thread under far armpit|Around neck grip tricep|Walk toward legs|Squeeze to finish

description: Mirror of D'arce going over shoulder first then under armpit for strangle
key_points: Over shoulder first|Then under armpit|Grip and roll|Finish with squeeze

description: Front headlock choke wrapping neck from front with chin-strap grip and compression

description: Marcelo Garcia guillotine variation with elbow raised high above shoulder for tighter finish

common_mistakes: Elbow too low|Loose grip|Not arching|Opponent escaping

description: Choke threading arm behind head through sleeve (gi) or fist to throat (no-gi)

description: Choke from north-south using arm around neck with lat and bicep compression

description: Collar choke from side using far collar grip and forearm blade pressure

description: Collar choke using baseball bat grip with four-fingers-in and thumb-in spinning through

description: Cross collar grip guiding head under armpit for choking finish

description: Gi choke from turtle walking around opponent's head like clock hands

description: Choke from crucifix position with arm around neck while controlling both arms

description: Fundamental arm hyperextension attack controlling arm with hips against elbow

description: Wrist hyperflexion attack isolating wrist and bending beyond normal range
